SELECT ISNULL(ROUND(convert(float, score) / NULLIF(convert(float, game_count), 0), 1), 0.0) AS score, ISNULL(ROUND(convert(float, o_r + d_r) / NULLIF(convert(float, game_count), 0), 1), 0.0) AS r_tot, ISNULL(ROUND(convert(float, a_s) / NULLIF(convert(float, game_count), 0), 1), 0.0) AS a_s, ISNULL(ROUND(convert(float, s_t) / NULLIF(convert(float, game_count), 0), 1), 0.0) AS s_t, ISNULL(ROUND(convert(float, b_s) / NULLIF(convert(float, game_count), 0), 1), 0.0) AS b_s, ISNULL(ROUND(convert(float, fg) / NULLIF(convert(float, game_count), 0), 1), 0.0) AS fg, ISNULL(ROUND(convert(float, fg) / NULLIF(convert(float, fg_a), 0), 1) * 100, 0.0) AS fgp, ISNULL(ROUND(convert(float, threep) / NULLIF(convert(float, game_count), 0), 1), 0.0) AS threep, ISNULL(ROUND(convert(float, threep) / NULLIF(convert(float, threep_a), 0), 1) * 100, 0.0) AS threepp, ISNULL(ROUND(convert(float, ft) / NULLIF(convert(float, game_count), 0), 1), 0.0) AS ft, ISNULL(ROUND(convert(float, ft) / NULLIF(convert(float, ft_a), 0), 1) * 100, 0.0) AS ftp, ISNULL(ROUND(convert(float, fg + threep) / NULLIF(convert(float, fg_a + threep_a), 0), 1) * 100, 0.0) AS ygp FROM KCC_EGIS.kbl_data.player_sum WHERE season_code = #{season_code} AND quarter_gu = 'XX' AND game_code = '01' AND player_no = #{player_no}

select * ,(o_r + d_r) AS r_tot ,ISNULL(ROUND((convert(float, fg) / NULLIF(convert(float, fg_a), 0) * 100), 1), 0.0) AS fgp ,ISNULL(ROUND((convert(float, threep) / NULLIF(convert(float, threep_a), 0) * 100), 1), 0.0) AS threepp ,ISNULL(ROUND((convert(float, ft) / NULLIF(convert(float, ft_a), 0) * 100), 1), 0.0) AS ftp ,ISNULL(ROUND((convert(float, fg + threep) / NULLIF(convert(float, fg_a + threep_a), 0) * 100), 1), 0.0) AS ygp from KCC_EGIS.kbl_data.player_sum where season_code =#{season_code} and quarter_gu ='XX' and game_code = '01' and player_no = #{player_no}

select ROUND((convert(float,sum(fg))/nullif(convert(float,sum(game_count)), 0)), 1) AS fg ,ROUND((convert(float,sum(fg))/nullif(convert(float,sum(fg_a)), 0) * 100), 1) AS fgp ,ROUND((convert(float,sum(ft))/nullif(convert(float,sum(game_count)), 0)), 1) AS ft ,ROUND((convert(float,sum(ft))/nullif(convert(float,sum(ft_a)), 0) * 100), 1) AS ftp ,ROUND((convert(float,sum(threep))/nullif(convert(float,sum(game_count)), 0)), 1) AS threep ,ROUND((convert(float,sum(threep))/nullif(convert(float,sum(threep_a)), 0) * 100), 1) AS threepp ,ROUND((convert(float,sum(o_r) + sum(d_r))/nullif(convert(float,sum(game_count)), 0)), 1) AS r_tot ,ROUND((convert(float,sum(a_s))/nullif(convert(float,sum(game_count)), 0)), 1) AS a_s ,ROUND((convert(float,sum(b_s))/nullif(convert(float,sum(game_count)), 0)), 1) AS b_s ,ROUND((convert(float,sum(s_t))/nullif(convert(float,sum(game_count)), 0)), 1) AS s_t ,ROUND((convert(float,sum(score))/nullif(convert(float,sum(game_count)), 0)), 1) AS score ,ROUND((convert(float,sum(fg)+sum(threep))/nullif(convert(float,sum(fg_a)+sum(threep_a)), 0) * 100), 1) AS ygp from KCC_EGIS.kbl_data.player_sum where player_no =#{player_no} and game_code ='01' and quarter_gu ='XX' and season_code in ((select season_code from KCC_EGIS.kbl_data.code_season where season_name_2 ='1군시즌'))

mapper.update: merge into KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_LIKE_PLAYER_PHOTO A using ( select #{id} AS id ,#{player_no} AS player_no ,#{img} AS img ) B on A.id = B.id and A.player_no = B.player_no WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE set A.img = B.img WHEN not MATCHED THEN INSERT ( id ,player_no ,img ) values ( B.id ,B.player_no ,B.img );
